name: SpecFlowReportGenerator
author: Mario Majcica
helpMarkDown: Generates SpecFlow test execution reports in HTML format.

inputs.name: reportType
inputs.label: Test Execution Report type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of the test execution to process.

inputs.name: projectFile
inputs.label: Project File
inputs.helpMarkDown: A path of the project file containing the feature files. This is a mandatory argument.

inputs.name: xmlTestResult
inputs.label: NUnit XML test result file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The XML test result file generated by nunit-console.

inputs.name: testOutput
inputs.label: NUnit test output file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The labeled test output file generated by nunit-console. Default: TestResult.txt

inputs.name: testResult
inputs.label: MsTest test result (trx) file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The TRX test result file generated by MsTest.

inputs.name: binFolder
inputs.label: A bin folder path
inputs.helpMarkDown: A path for the compiled SpecFlow project. Default: bin\Debug

inputs.name: xsltFile
inputs.label: Xslt File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom XSLT file to use, defaults to built-in stylesheet if not provided.
